sentence.Network_cn: 目的:研究灯盏花注射液对神经元缺血损伤的作用.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the optimum extraction and clarification process of Erigeron breviscapus oral liquid.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:优选灯盏细辛口服液的提取工艺.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Latin, groundsel (the original sense in English), from Greek ērigerōn, from ēri 'early' + gerōn 'old man' (because the plant flowers early in the year, and some species bear grey down)

means.word_mean: 1. cosmopolitan genus of usually perennial herbs with flowers that resemble asters; leaves occasionally (especially formerly) used medicinally
